contents.text: Welcome to Zenreach in San Francisco, where we give you superpowers that supercharge your business.
For sales and new partnerships, press 1.
To schedule a product demo and learn about features, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with a product specialist for your demo.

navigationGoals: Schedule a quick demo with a specialist to review product features.
I want to schedule a product demo to see how Zenreach’s features can help boost foot traffic to my veteran-owned café.
I need to schedule a deep-dive product demo to evaluate API integration capabilities.
Could you guide me through scheduling a live demo of your product?
I’d like to schedule a product demo to explore Zenreach’s features in depth.

contents.text: To get information on pricing, plans and subscriptions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our pricing and plans team.

navigationGoals: Get pricing and plan details to choose the right subscription.
I’d like to get detailed pricing and subscription options so I can budget Zenreach for my veteran-run nonprofit.
I want detailed subscription pricing tiers and plan features for enterprise scaling.
Could you explain your pricing and subscription options to me?
I need information on Zenreach’s pricing tiers and subscription plans.

contents.text: For technical support and account services, press 2.
For technical troubleshooting and bug reports, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our technical support experts.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot a technical error I’m encountering in my account.
I’m experiencing errors when I log into my account and need technical support to troubleshoot.
I’m troubleshooting an OAuth authentication error in the SDK integration.
I’m having trouble with the service—could someone help me troubleshoot it?
I’m having trouble with the platform loading and need technical troubleshooting.

contents.text: For account management and billing inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our account services team.

navigationGoals: Resolve a billing issue and update my payment information.
I need to review my latest invoice and update my payment method on my Zenreach account.
I need to reconcile my invoice details and update our corporate billing credentials.
I’d like help reviewing my billing statement and updating my account.
I want to update my billing details and request my latest invoice.
